SEARCH
Package UI

Class BaseUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
Direct Known Subclasses:
DashboardUI, DishUI, InventoryUI, MenusUI, SalesUI, StaffUI, StockOrdersUI, TableOverviewUI, WasteUI, WineUI
public abstract class BaseUI extends Object
This abstract class serves as a base for creating UI components in the application. Provides common UI elements and functionalities such as side menu and top text.

    • createSideMenuContent

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createSideMenuContent()
      Creates the content for the side menu, including buttons for navigation.
      Returns:
      A VBox containing the side menu content.

    • createSideMenuButtons

      protected javafx.scene.control.Button createSideMenuButtons(String label, int leftPadding, String imagePath)
      Creates a button for the side menu.
      Parameters:
      label - The text label of the button.
      leftPadding - The padding on the left side of the button.
      imagePath - The path to the image icon for the button.
      Returns:
      A button for use in the side menu.

    • highlightButton

      protected void highlightButton(String label)
      Highlights the specified button and unhighlights all others. This method first unhighlights all buttons, then highlights the button associated with the given label.
      Parameters:
      label - The label of the button to highlight.

    • highlightButton

      private void highlightButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Applies a highlight style to the specified button. This method changes the button's style to indicate that it is currently selected or active. This method is intended for internal use by highlightButton(String label).
      Parameters:
      button - The button to highlight.

    • unhighlightButton

      private void unhighlightButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Removes the highlight style from the specified button. This method resets the button's style to its default state, indicating that it is not currently selected. This method is intended for internal use by highlightButton(String label).
      Parameters:
      button - The button to unhighlight.

    • handleButtonAction

      protected void handleButtonAction(String label)
      Handles the action when a button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      label - The label of the button that was clicked.

    • getMainContent

      protected javafx.scene.layout.VBox getMainContent()
      Returns the main content container.
      Returns:
      The main content container as a VBox.
